mapper.select: select r.*, m.m_name, m.m_tel from reply r, member m where (r.bt_num = #{bt_num} and r.bc_num = #{bc_num} and r.p_num = #{p_num}) and r.m_id = m.m_id order by r_group desc, r_indent
mapper.insert: insert into reply (m_id, bt_num, bc_num, p_num, r_num, r_rate, r_indent, r_group, r_info, r_writedate, r_openclose, r_level) values (#{m_id},#{bt_num},#{bc_num},#{p_num},Reply_max( #{bt_num}, #{bc_num},#{p_num}), #{r_rate},#{r_indent},Reply_max( #{bt_num}, #{bc_num},#{p_num}),#{r_info},sysdate,#{r_openclose},#{r_level})
mapper.delete: delete from reply where bt_num = #{bt_num} and bc_num = #{bc_num} and p_num = #{p_num} and r_num = #{r_num}
mapper.insert: insert into reply (m_id, bt_num, bc_num, p_num, r_num, r_indent, r_group, r_info, r_writedate, r_level) values (#{m_id},#{bt_num},#{bc_num},#{p_num},Reply_max( #{bt_num}, #{bc_num},#{p_num}),#{r_indent}+1, #{r_group},#{r_info},sysdate,#{r_level}+1)
